org.jasig.cas.support.saml.web.flow.mdui

Class StaticMetadataResolverAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.support.saml.web.flow.mdui.AbstractMetadataResolverAdapter
      • org.jasig.cas.support.saml.web.flow.mdui.StaticMetadataResolverAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MetadataResolverAdapter, org.quartz.Job

    public final class StaticMetadataResolverAdapter
extends AbstractMetadataResolverAdapter
implements org.quartz.Job
    A StaticMetadataResolverAdapter that loads metadata from static xml files served by urls or locally.
    Since:
    4.1.0
